```python
from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene = canvas(width=700, height=400)

# Cyber Input Variable Mapping
Height_I = 5

# Constants
g = 9.81  # acceleration due to gravity (m/s^2)
v0 = 10   # initial velocity of the ball (m/s)

# Objects
ground = box(pos=vector(0, -Height_I, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 5), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, -Height_I, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)

# Initial Conditions
ball.velocity = vector(v0, 0, 0)

# Animation Loop
dt = 0.01  # time step
t = 0      # initial time
while True:
    rate(100)  # maximum 100 iterations per second
    
    # Update ball position
    ball.pos.x += ball.velocity.x * dt
    ball.pos.y += ball.velocity.y * dt - 0.5 * g * t**2
    
    # Update ball velocity
    ball.velocity.y = -g * t
    
    # Check collision with ground
    if ball.pos.y - ball.radius < ground.pos.y + ground.size.y / 2:
        ball.velocity.y *= -1
    
    t += dt
```
